overview.summary: This module builds an interpolant field -- a field that indicates how to project data from one field onto the data of a second field.

description.p: The MapDistanceField module builds an interpolant field that contains data about how to interpolate source field data for the geometry of the destination field. The resulting interpolant field can then be used by the ApplyInterpolant module to interpolate the values from a field, similar to the source field, onto the destination field.

DirectInterpolate should be used instead of BuildInterpolant and ApplyInterpolant if the interpolant is not to be reused, as it performs the same interpolation without building the intermediate interpolant field. This should be used if the source field changes much more often than the destination field.
